alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Sweetwater County through 245 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 43 miles east of Squaw Hollow Boat Ramp On Flaming Gorge, which is also 47 miles southeast of Rock Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Sweetwater County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
